amendment.description: Amendment adds the House Committee on Resources to the distribution list for a report on the review of NOAA laboratories.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of October 11 as amendment No. 27, to add the Committee on Resources to the list of recipients that would receive a report concerning the review of laboratories operated by NOAA issued by the Secretary of Commerce.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Saxton amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
